meaningMnemonic: You take this <radical>comb</radical>, break the handle off, and use it to <radical>stamp</radical> your official <kanji>seal</kanji> of approval onto a document. It's kind of a messy <kanji>mark</kanji>ing process, but it gets the job done.
readingMnemonic: You need this <kanji>seal</kanji> to stay at an <reading>inn</reading> (いん). All inns require official paperwork, so you had to improvise and make a seal on the fly.
